Header.Info: Performance Monitoring Events for 12th and 13th Generation Intel(R) Core(TM) Processor - V1.36

Events.BriefDescription: Counts the number of coherent and in-coherent requests initiated by IA cores, processor graphic units, or LLC.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts the number of coherent and in-coherent requests initiated by IA cores, processor graphic units, or LLC.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_REQUESTS.RD]
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_TRK_REQUESTS.RD]

Events.BriefDescription: Number of requests allocated in Coherency Tracker.
Events.PublicDescription: Number of requests allocated in Coherency Tracker.

Events.BriefDescription: This 48-bit fixed counter counts the UCLK cycles.
Events.PublicDescription: This 48-bit fixed counter counts the UCLK cycles.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of clocks
Events.PublicDescription: Number of clocks

Events.BriefDescription: Incoming VC0 read request
Events.PublicDescription: Incoming VC0 read request

Events.BriefDescription: Incoming VC0 write request
Events.PublicDescription: Incoming VC0 write request

Events.BriefDescription: Incoming VC1 read request
Events.PublicDescription: Incoming VC1 read request

Events.BriefDescription: Incoming VC1 write request
Events.PublicDescription: Incoming VC1 write request

Events.BriefDescription: Incoming read prefetch request from IA.
Events.PublicDescription: Incoming read prefetch request from IA.

Events.BriefDescription: Any Rank at Hot state
Events.PublicDescription: Any Rank at Hot state

Events.BriefDescription: Any Rank at Warm state
Events.PublicDescription: Any Rank at Warm state

Events.BriefDescription: incoming read request page status is Page Hit
Events.PublicDescription: incoming read request page status is Page Hit

Events.BriefDescription: incoming read request page status is Page Empty
Events.PublicDescription: incoming read request page status is Page Empty

Events.BriefDescription: incoming read request page status is Page Miss
Events.PublicDescription: incoming read request page status is Page Miss

Events.BriefDescription: incoming write request page status is Page Hit
Events.PublicDescription: incoming write request page status is Page Hit

Events.BriefDescription: incoming write request page status is Page Empty
Events.PublicDescription: incoming write request page status is Page Empty

Events.BriefDescription: incoming write request page status is Page Miss
Events.PublicDescription: incoming write request page status is Page Miss

Events.BriefDescription: Read CAS command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: Read CAS command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: Write CAS command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: Write CAS command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: ACT command for a read request sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: ACT command for a read request sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: ACT command for a write request sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: ACT command for a write request sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: ACT command sent to DRAM
Events.PublicDescription: ACT command sent to DRAM

Events.BriefDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM for a read/write request
Events.PublicDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM for a read/write request

Events.BriefDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM due to page table idle timer expiration
Events.PublicDescription: PRE command sent to DRAM due to page table idle timer expiration

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every 64B read  request entering the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels).
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every 64B read request entering the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels).

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every 64B read request entering the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels).
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every 64B read entering the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels).

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every 64B write request entering the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels). Each write request counts as a new request incrementing this counter. However, same cache line write requests (both full and partial) are combined to a single 64 byte data transfer to DRAM.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every 64B write request entering the Memory Controller 0 to DRAM (sum of all channels).

Events.BriefDescription: Counts every 64B write request entering the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels). Each write request counts as a new request incrementing this counter. However, same cache line write requests (both full and partial) are combined to a single 64 byte data transfer to DRAM.
Events.PublicDescription: Counts every 64B write request entering the Memory Controller 1 to DRAM (sum of all channels).

Events.BriefDescription: Each cycle counts number of all outgoing valid entries in ReqTrk. Such entry is defined as valid from its allocation in ReqTrk till deallocation. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.
Events.PublicDescription: Each cycle counts number of all outgoing valid entries in ReqTrk. Such entry is defined as valid from its allocation in ReqTrk till deallocation. Accounts for Coherent and non-coherent traffic.

Events.BriefDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD]
Events.PublicDescription: Number of all coherent Data Read entries. Doesn't include prefetches [This event is alias to UNC_ARB_REQ_TRK_REQUEST.DRD]
